li.label: nightmarish environment
li.description: This place is repulsive beyond description. I wish I could be anywhere else.

li.label: hideous environment
li.description: This place is so unbearably grotesque. I wish I didn't have to look at this any more.

li.label: ugly environment
li.description: This place is really ugly. I wish I didn't have to look at all this.

li.label: beautiful environment
li.description: I really like this place. It's beautiful.

li.label: gorgeous environment
li.description: This place is so beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.

li.label: paradisic environment
li.description: This beauty of this place is rapturous. I wish I'd never have to leave.

li.label: afraid of wild animals
li.description: How am I supposed to keep calm when such a savage creature is nearby?!

li.label: bookworm read recently
li.description: Reading is a joy.

li.label: talked with a conversationalist
li.description: What a stimulating conversation.

li.label: skullspikes
li.description: I've been around a few skullspikes recently. They make for great ambiance.

li.label: skullspikes
li.description: I've been around quite a few skullspikes recently. It sends a shiver down my spine - in a good way!

li.label: skullspikes
li.description: All these skullspikes have made my day!

li.label: observed corpse
li.description: I got to see a dead body!

li.label: stressed by a hysteric
li.description: I got too close to someone having a hysteric fit. It was disturbing.

li.label: lovesick
li.description: There's an empty space in my heart. It hurts so much.

li.label: missing my lover
li.description: I wish my love was here with me.

li.label: love is wonderful
li.description: I'm no longer alone! I'm on top of the world!

li.label: let a lovesick down
li.description: I just broke that poor sap's heart over my knee, and it feels awful.

li.label: rebuffed a lovesick
li.description: I fended off that weirdo's advances, but the melodrama of it really got to me.

li.label: mariner is wet
li.description: I'm soaking wet.

li.label: entombed underground
li.description: I've been underground too long. I feel like the weight of this mountain is crushing me. I need to see the sky and feel the wind.

li.label: trapped underground
li.description: How long have I been underground? I need to get out in the fresh air and spend some time under the sky.

li.label: cabin fever
li.description: I've spent so long indoors I feel like the roof is pressing in. I need to get out and see the sky.

li.label: trapped indoors
li.description: It's been too long since I've seen the sky.

li.label: stuck indoors
li.description: I'd like to go outside and get some fresh air.

li.label: chilly
li.description: I'm cold.

li.label: cold
li.description: I'm shivering.

li.label: numbing cold
li.description: My teeth are chattering.

li.label: absolutely freezing
li.description: My toes are numb. I need to get warm.

li.label: sweaty
li.description: I'm sweating.

li.label: hot
li.description: It's really hot out.

li.label: sweltering hot
li.description: You could fry an egg on the ground right now.

li.label: blistering hot
li.description: This place is searing hot, dangerously so.

li.label: forming a caravan
li.description: I can't wait to be out on the road!

li.label: out on the road
li.description: Out on the road, but with nowhere to go... out on the road, out on the road I go.

li.label: people pleaser
li.description: Mood from the 'people pleaser' trait, equal to a fifth of the average opinion everyone one knows has of oneself.

li.label: witnessed mental break
li.description: Such exquisite suffering...

li.label: witnessed hysteric fit
li.description: What hilarity! Hysteria is so delightful to witness.

li.label: {0} savored my suffering
li.description: To make fun of me at my lowest - how callous!

li.label: skulker is invisible
li.description: We move unseen.

li.label: sniper needs ranged weapon
li.description: I hate having to get up close and personal. I need a ranged weapon.

li.label: tempestophile
li.description: The 'Tempestophile' trait grants bonus mood while 1) under the open sky and 2) either the weather is not clear, or an exotic-yet-natural meteorological event is occuring.

li.label: beauty vanity
li.description: Mood from the 'vain' trait, equal to 10 times one's own beauty score, and further modified by the number of masterwork or legendary items worn.

li.label: wearing awful apparel
li.description: Why am I wearing this!? It offends every fiber of my being, and I must discard it as soon as possible.

li.label: wearing poor apparel
li.description: I am wearing dismally plebian apparel. I very much want to discard it right now.

li.label: wearing normal apparel
li.description: Others may call its quality "normal", but I'm wearing something that is beneath my standards, and I should discard it.

li.label: viciousness needs release
li.description: I need to express myself... by hurting something... a lot.

li.label: uncomfortable?
li.description: Nah.

li.label: comfortable
li.description: I've been comfortable recently.

li.label: quite comfortable
li.description: I've been very comfortable recently.

li.label: extremely comfortable
li.description: I've been extremely comfortable recently. This place is so cushy!

li.label: luxuriantly comfortable
li.description: I am resting on clouds of heaven.

li.label: uncomfortable?
li.description: Genetically deadened senses are preventing a mood malus from discomfort.

li.label: comfortable
li.description: Genetically deadened senses will prevent any mood malus from discomfort.

li.label: quite comfortable
li.description: Genetically deadened senses will prevent any mood malus from discomfort.

li.label: extremely comfortable
li.description: Genetically deadened senses will prevent any mood malus from discomfort.

li.label: luxuriantly comfortable
li.description: Genetically deadened senses will prevent any mood malus from discomfort.

li.label: need for superiority
li.description: I need to feel above others, either by having slaves or by holding a position of authority. The more slaves, the better.

li.label: the stench of slavery
li.description: No one should be enslaved.

li.label: freedom for all
li.description: It is good that nobody is enslaved or imprisoned.

li.label: Superstitious (horrifying omen)
li.description: I have witnessed a particularly fell portent. What woe does it portend?

li.label: Superstitious (bad omen)
li.description: Something wicked this way comes.

li.label: Superstitious (good omen)
li.description: Something good will happen soon, I'm sure of it.

li.label: Superstitious (wondrous omen)
li.description: I've seen an amazing sign - everything's coming up aces!

li.label: xenogenetic abomination
li.description: My genetic purity was sullied with filth.

li.label: misopedist
li.description: Any children is too many.

li.label: caretaker
li.description: Children are a joy and a gift. The more children, the merrier.

li.label: misopedist is pregnant
li.description: I have got one of the disgusting little things inside me.

li.label: caretaker is pregnant
li.description: I have been entrusted with the greatest responsibility.

li.label: I'm a mechanitor
li.description: I'm so glad I have the privilege to conduct mechanoids.

li.label: I'm a mechanitor
li.description: No one should have this power. This insidious thing in my brain... no good can come from it.

li.label: mechaphile
li.description: It is right for man and machine for coexist. The more mechanoids we have around, the better.

li.label: mechaphobe
li.description: The more mechanoids we have around, the more I worry for our safety.

li.label: saw allied mechanoid die
li.description: Mechs can be rebuilt, but they never come back the same. We lost someone.

li.label: killed a mechanoid
li.description: Frakkin' clankers.

li.label: environmentalism
li.description: Environmentalists are unhappy in more polluted tiles, but very happy in unpolluted ones.

li.label: I'm a mechanitor
li.description: I don't want this power.

li.label: environmentalist vs smog
li.description: This world is hurting.

li.label: unnatural catastrophe
li.description: The void will break this world under the weight of an endless black sky. It makes me shiver with anticipation.

li.label: planetkiller catastrophe
li.description: A planetkiller is on its way. It will be here soon - and oh, when it does, everything will be unmade in glorious fire.

li.label: climate catastrophe
li.description: The 'catastrophist' trait grants bonus mood while 1) under the open sky and 2) there is a destructive climatological event occuring, such as a volcanic winter or toxic fallout.

li.label: uncorrupted
li.description: The void? Huh?

li.label: minor corruption
li.description: It stirs. Something unspeakable looms in the edges of my perceptions.

li.label: moderate corruption
li.description: Maddened murmurings reach me even now... from the depths of darkness, something beckons...

li.label: major corruption
li.description: There is nowhere to hide. There never was. Sightless, its gaze pierces all places and moments. Sleepless, its dreams run manifest. Formless, yet I can feel it all about me-!

li.label: utter corruption
li.description: I understand now! The binding force of the universe is hatred. It runs thick, hot, lightless; braiding and twining madly in the space-beneath-space. This cosmos, with its stars and its lives and its hope and happiness and laughter - it is all some sick, malformed joke!

li.label: lingering corruption
li.description: The harsh cacophany of the void has dimmed, but it was not banished from this world. It lingers at the edges of my thoughts still.

li.label: haunted
li.description: It is always out there, lurking. I feel its attention upon me like a physical thing, slick and oily and choking.

li.label: killed an unnatural entity
li.description: I am what the night fears.

li.label: safe from monsters
li.description: Our world is safe from the void - or, at least, as safe as anyone can be from that realm of nightmare.

li.label: monster love unattainable
li.description: open the void open the void open the void open the void open the void
